name: Robix
description:
A deadly virus has spread in the Machina Kingdom! Rotate the gears inside robots to locate the viruses and destroy them once and for all.

Credits:

  • Shawn Liu / Game Design Lead, Scripter
  • Dan Li / Game Designer, Manager
  • Ian Miley / Artist, Animator
  • Instuctor: Steven Goodale
  • Made in GAM 651: Prototype Game Development

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Mobile Android
